column1: Haleth the Hunter was one of the Fathers of Men
column2: who first appears in The Quenta as the son of Hador
column4: p. 104. later as the leader of one of the Three Houses of Men
column5: See e.g.  (born in Eriador in F.A. 388);  (comes into Beleriand with his people);  (his son Hundor born in F.A. 413). until his character was replaced by Haleth.
